subject: Books and Literature
Football
Swimming
Olympic Games
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The story of a group of American rowers and its quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics tops the list of best-selling sports books for November 2015, according to the New York Times best-seller list.
